sentences.english: An order of basidiomycetes that contains the mushrooms and toadstools.

sentences.chinese: 傘菌在俚語中通常被稱爲“有毒的蘑菇”。

sentences.english: Why is the fly or bug agaric toadstool so named?
sentences.chinese: 毒蠅傘菌或者毒臭蟲傘菌因何而得名？

sentences.english: Why is the fly or bug agaric toadstool so named?
sentences.chinese: 毒蠅傘菌或者毒臭蟲傘菌因何而得名？

sentences.english: An inedible or poisonous fungus with an umbrella-shaped fruiting body.
sentences.chinese: 傘菌一種不可食用或有毒的菌。
